whitespaceExcess: This paragraph has a lot of whitespace that should be stripped away .
properWhitespace: This paragraph has intended whitespace what should not be removed because it is no more than one.
trimRight: This pararaph has both, leading and trailing whitespace.
trimLeft: This pararaph has both, leading and trailing whitespace.
trimBoth: This pararaph has both, leading and trailing whitespace.
trimAlone: This pararaph has both, leading and trailing whitespace.
